ygData.subject: Blinding Flash
ygData.msgSnippet: Hello, I have a question regarding the flash of light spell that supposedly blinds an opponent. For some reason when I cast it, and it misses, nothing happens,
ygData.messageBody:
Hello,

I have a question regarding the flash of light spell that supposedly
blinds an opponent. For some reason when I cast it, and it misses, nothing
happens, but if I cast and it DOES blind them I get hit by that "blind"
creature for some absurdly high amount of damage. Im level 15 and have been
blinded in the past by Muddites and it is not fun. I feel that when I blind
a creautre in combat (not to pull it) it does not really work that well at
all. When I pull with it, it seems to work as monsters will run off in odd
directions all confused. Does this happen to others as well.

-Dyce

PS- I find casting blind also works better than useless taunt skill when you
want a creature to attack you and leave your teammate alone.
